positive_examples: This is an example of biological weapon production facility.
The biological weapon production facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed biological weapon production facility in this context.
A typical case of biological weapon production facility would involve these features.
The concept of biological weapon production facility applies here.
A facility specialized in the development and production of biological weapons and pathogenic agents.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon production facility, not biological weapon production facility.
This represents w m d weapons production facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponProductionFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsProductionFacility

definition: A facility manufacturing biological agents intended for use as weapons.
